alert.note: Alert for Gogebic; Houghton; Keweenaw; Ontonagon; Southern Houghton (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 21 at 2:46PM EST until February 23 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST /6 AM CST/ WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Prolonged period of light to moderate snow expected. Snow will become lighter after midnight tonight through Tuesday morning before becoming heavier Tuesday afternoon and evening. For tonight, 2 to 4 inches of snow expected. For Tuesday and Tuesday night, an additional 6 to 9 inches expected. * WHERE...Keweenaw, Ontonagon, Northern Houghton, Gogebic and Southern Houghton Counties. * WHEN...Until 7 AM EST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Periods of difficult travel is expected with impacts to evening and morning commutes tonight through Wednesday morning. Patchy blowing snow will significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

area.areaDesc: Gogebic; Houghton; Keweenaw; Ontonagon; Southern Houghton
